column3:
いつの日か貴女の主が
ここを訪れるまで待っていて下さい……
column4: Your master will come for you.Until then, you shall rest safely here.

column3:
貴女の言う様に長い眠りが彼の記憶を奪ったとしても……

大丈夫
あの人は またきっと貴女の前に現れます
column4:
Although the Slumber of Restoration will
most certainly deprive him of his memories,please trust me when I say that I know
he will arrive before you yet again.

column3:
強うなられたの
姫巫女……
column4: I sense there is great strength in your dedication.

column3:
デクの樹様……

いつの日か彼が ここを訪れたら伝えて頂けますか？
column4:
Great Deku Tree, I ask of you, when he returns,
can you please relay this message...

column3:
ハイラルの姫巫女よ……

そなた これからどうするのじゃ？
column4:
If I may be so bold...what is it that you
are planning to do next, Princess?

column3:
この剣が……

マスターソードが教えてくれました
column4: The Master Sword...I heard it speak to me.

column3:
私には やる事が……

まだやれる事があります
column4: It seems that my role is unfinished.There is still something I must do.

column3:
彼の者に聞かせる言葉は
主の口よりこそ紡がれるべきでは無いか？
column4:
Words intended for him would sound much better in
the tones of your voice, don't you think?
